verbs.description: [V: auburn] [ARG1: ad] wants changes in scheduling against bama and georgia auburn athletic director allen green ​made it clear that he was not a fan of the current sec scheduling layout ​the current scheduling framework has the tigers facing off against both alabama and georgia in the final three weeks of every season currently sitting at 6 - 3 auburn already locked up a bowl game yet they could improve their status with solid finish to the season ending their regular season slate against two of the top teams in allan green georgia allen green tigers football bama kentucky auburn director southeastern conference lsu sec auburn kentucky tigers militia lifesavers underground alabama
